sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from "react-html-parser" import {Table, TdLeft, TdRight, PackDiv, Theader, Tbody, Body, Content, Td } from '../PackPromoElement' import ShoppingCartOrange from "../../../images/shoppingCartOrange.png" export default function Category(props) { const { active, cat, index, handleSelection } = props; return ( <> { cat.products.map(item => ( <>
Description : {ReactHtmlParser(item.description)}
Prestations :
Contenues {ReactHtmlParser(item.contentPrestation)}
Délai en semaines : {item.leadTime}
Prix TTC FCFA {item.cfa}
Prix TTC Euros {item.euro}
)) } ) }
